dialogue: One of my friends managed to pay off their first house at the age of 25.
Wow, that is impressive.  How long did it take them to pay it off?
About 4-5 years. He had to work his ass off.
That is a long time to be paying off a house.  Did he have a lot of debt?
No but his mortgage was quite expensive since his house is pretty big.
He must have been very fortunate to be able to do that at such a young age.
Yes I cannot believe it. Having such financial stability at 25 is an incredible feat.
Yes it is.  I wish I could have done that when I was that young.
I think it's something a majority of us cannot do. Getting a good job and a successful career takes time.
I agree.  It takes a lot to get to that point in life.  You have to work hard to get where you want to be.
I just graduated from college! I feel so accomplished.
Congratulations! That's a big accomplishment. What did you graduate in, if you don't mind me asking?
I graduated with a Masters in Engineering from the University of Cambridge.
Oh wow, congratulations! You must be very proud of yourself. What are you going to do with your degree?
Thank you I am very happy myself. I am going to work as a Software Engineer at Google.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great. What kind of work will you be doing?
The day-to-day mostly involves building high quality software systems and testing / maintaining them thoroughly to support the vast number of users Google has.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I hope you have a great time at your new job!
Thank you. I am looking forward to it as well!
You're welcome. I wish you the best of luck in your future endeavors.
I just got a puppy, but I have to leave him at home while I go to work. I feel so bad.
Aww, I'm sure he'll be fine. What kind of puppy is it?
It is a pug. I feel terrible about leaving him alone but my work does not allow dogs unfortunately :((
That's too bad. Maybe you can take him to a dog park and let him play with other dogs.
I do that in the evenings, however, I cannot just leave him in the park alone. That would be so irresponsible.
I know what you mean, but it's better to be safe than sorry. Do you have any other pets?
Yes it is of course in the interest of safety that I cannot. No I don't have any other pets. Too much work.
I can understand that. It's hard to find the time to take care of a pet.
Yes that's my whole problem. I do not know what to do. I miss him!
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you can find some time to spend with him.
i have always felt really guilty about lying to my parents
I'm sorry to hear that. Why did you lie to them? Did they find out?

They are just very narrow-minded about a lot of things so I have to lie to them about the smallest of things. I do realise it's a bad thing to do but I have no other option. They haven't found out yet but I still feel guilty.
Why do you feel guilty about it? Do you think they would be upset if you told them?
Yes I am quite sure they will be. I find it hard to communicate my feelings to them.
That's understandable. I'm sure they would understand if you just told them the truth.
I cannot tell them how I feel because on some level I think we lack the sort of understanding and connect you know?
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you can find a way to make it up to them somehow.
I just try to be a good son and compensate in other areas which they do understand.
That sounds like a good way to go about it. I wish you the best of luck!
I always feel like no one hears me. Like When I speak it falls on deaf ears.
Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that. Have you been to a doctor about it?
It is not really an issue that a doctor needs to deal with. It's just people do not really hear what I'm trying to tell them.
That's too bad. I hope you can find a doctor that can help you with that.
You said that already and no I do not want a doctor!!
I'm so sorry, I didn't mean to make you feel that way. Do you have any family or friends that you can talk to?
Well I have talked to my family about it but that's been zero help.
I am sorry to hear that. Have you thought about talking to a counselor or therapist?
I do not need a therapist. I just need some supportive and understanding people who get it.
That's good. I'm glad you have someone to talk to. I hope you feel better.
